original_text: So the victory that day was turned into mourning for all the people, for the people heard that day, “The king is grieving for his son.”
korean_text: 왕이 그 아들을 위하여 슬퍼한다 함이 그 날에 백성들에게 들리매 그 날의 승리가 모든 백성에게 슬픔이 된지라

sentences.original_text: So the victory that day was turned into mourning
for the people heard that day
“The king is grieving for his son.”
